query:
SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH, COLUMN_TYPE 
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 
WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'paymentProviders' 
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('accessToken', 'refreshToken', 'tokenExpiresAt')
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VZWkmDdVMGTAoV.53e2061c2123 --database FUrq59UAJ9LE4f7MefV9tg --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH, COLUMN_TYPE 
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 
WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'paymentProviders' 
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('accessToken', 'refreshToken', 'tokenExpiresAt')
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH	COLUMN_TYPE
accessToken	text	65535	text
refreshToken	text	65535	text
tokenExpiresAt	timestamp	NULL	timestamp
